body_html:
It does not matter. The work after -n is the name of your conda environment. You can choose it to be any word you like. To have your environment be the same as that in the instructions choose 'tensorflow'.

Make sure you choose GPU binary is step 4.
body_text:
It does not matter. The work after -n is the name of your conda environment. You can choose it to be any word you like. To have your environment be the same as that in the instructions choose 'tensorflow'.
Make sure you choose GPU binary is step 4.
body:
It does not matter. The work after -n is the name of your conda environment. You can choose it to be any word you like. To have your environment be the same as that in the instructions choose 'tensorflow'.  

Make sure you choose GPU binary is step 4.
